item.title: Is Your NFT Collectable Secure and Legitimate?
item.description: What is an NFT? NFT stands for NonFungible Token. Think of it as a digital record which has been minted (created) on a blockchain. Meaning, the file represents “something” that has been recorded on a blockchain. It is very unlikely the NFT itself is stored on a blockchain, rather the transaction details and a reference to the actual NFT location are stored on the blockchain. There are many potential “gotcha’s” associated with NFT’s.
